<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="catalog3">de9fed0983fdea1034af11b6feaad3f6</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>GeneratePDF</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    // var variable1Value = $scope.page.g_form.getValue('variable_1');
    var variable1Value = "vvvv";
    // var variable2Value = $scope.page.g_form.getValue('variable_2');
    var variable2Value = "aaaa";
    var title = "11111";

    // c.generatePDF = function() {
    console.log("准备发送PDF生成请求");
    var ga = new GlideAjax('PDFGenerator');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'generatePDF'); // managerName is the function in the script include that we're calling 
    ga.addParam('sysparm_variable1', variable1Value);
    ga.addParam('sysparm_variable2', variable2Value);
    ga.addParam('sysparm_title', title);

    function aaa(response) {
        var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
        console.log('=======answer =========', answer);
        console.log('===== ajax response ====', res);
    }

    ga.getXML(aaa);

    // };
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-28 14:40:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>610d10698331ae1034af11b6feaad30b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GeneratePDF</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Demo3" source="x_1755581_demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_610d10698331ae1034af11b6feaad30b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-28 14:55:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
